sections.heading: Sewers; rental charges; cumulative to service rate for maintenance and repair
sections.text: The charges permitted by sections 17-925.02 to 17-925.04 shall be in addition to the charges permitted by section 17-925.01 for the maintenance and repair of a sewer system.SourceLaws 1947, c. 43, ยง 3, p. 159;Laws 2017, LB
